# SpeechAnalyzer.Options.ModelRetention.processLifetime

**Case**

Keeps the models in memory until this process exits.

## Declaration

```swift
case processLifetime
```

## Retention options

- **SpeechAnalyzer.Options.ModelRetention.lingering**: Keeps the models in memory for a time so that they can be reused by another compatible analyzer session.
- **SpeechAnalyzer.Options.ModelRetention.whileInUse**: Releases the models when the analyzer is deallocated.
